# DT example

```{r}
data <- cars

datatable(data, filter = "top", extensions = 'Buttons', options = list(
    dom = 'Bfrtip',
    buttons = c('copy', 'csv', 'excel', 'pdf', 'print')
  )) %>% formatSignif(1:ncol(data), 3)
```
